full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 177 of 262 1888 LC8VMAX6 Rodgers - cross 1 Q. Now, on the occasions that you did speak to Ghislaine about scheduling a flight, that was because she was going to be traveling on that flight; isn't that right? 2 A. Yes. 3 Q. Okay. So if she wasn't traveling on the flight, you typically would coordinate with someone else, right? 4 A. That's correct. 5 Q. One of Epstein's secretaries or something like that? 6 A. Correct. 7 Q. Okay. So that was the 1990s I think we were just discussing; correct? 8 A. Correct. 9 Q. I want to fast forward to the 2000s. Okay. 10 In the 2000s, you spoke to some different people about scheduling flights, isn't that right? 11 A. Yes. He had a different secretary. Yes, it would be different people, but the same position. 12 Q. Right. Same position, but different people started filling these positions, right? 13 A. Yes. 14 Q. Do you recall a person named Lesley Groff? 15 A. Say again? 16 Q. Do you recall someone named Lesley Groff? 17 A. Yes. 18 Q. Okay. She was Epstein's secretary in the 2000s, right? 19 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00019039

1 Q. Now, on the occasions that you did speak to Ghislaine about scheduling a flight, that was because she was going to be traveling on that flight; isn't that right? 2 A. Yes. 3 Q. Okay. So if she wasn't traveling on the flight, you typically would coordinate with someone else, right? 4 A. That's correct. 5 Q. One of Epstein's secretaries or something like that? 6 A. Correct. 7 Q. Okay. So that was the 1990s I think we were just discussing; correct? 8 A. Correct. 9 Q. I want to fast forward to the 2000s. Okay. 10 In the 2000s, you spoke to some different people about scheduling flights, isn't that right? 11 A. Yes. He had a different secretary. Yes, it would be different people, but the same position. 12 Q. Right. Same position, but different people started filling these positions, right? 13 A. Yes. 14 Q. Do you recall a person named Lesley Groff? 15 A. Say again? 16 Q. Do you recall someone named Lesley Groff? 17 A. Yes. 18 Q. Okay. She was Epstein's secretary in the 2000s, right? 19
